scenes.caption: Three boxes overlaid on an image of a gift shop. Box J has a light face looking down. Box O has a light face looking to the side. Box R has a headless mannequin. Two more headless mannequins are in the foreground and not part of any box. Four more faces are in the background.
One box overlaid on an image of a clothing boutique. Box Y has a light face.

Three boxes overlaid on an image of a t-shirt shop. Box B has a dark face. Box P has a mannequin head with a hat. Box E has a mannequin head with a hat. One more mannequin is in the foreground and not part of any box.

Six boxes overlaid on an image of a train station platform. Box U has a light face. Box O has a light face. Box L has a dark face with a hat. Box A has a dark face with a hat and looking to the side. Box Q has a face reflected in a mirror. Box M has a dark face with a backwards hat. Two more dark faces in the foreground are not part of any box. One dark face is only partially in the image.
Three boxes overlaid on an image of a mall escalator. Box W has a light face looking to the side. Box I has a face with a hat and looking down. Box N has the back of a face.
One box overlaid on an image of a shopping mall. Box I has a light face. Two dark faces in the foreground are not part of any box.
